items.sentence: Tom is doing a good job under very difficult circumstances.
Your way of looking at something depends on your situation.
Tom found it fairly easy to follow Mary without being seen.
Tom told Mary she didn\'t have to worry about John anymore.
Tom says he doesn\'t have very much money on him right now.
I can\'t imagine what life on another planet would be like.
It\'ll be easier for me to do since I have the right tools.
According to the thermometer, it\'s thirty degrees outside.
The police are now investigating the cause of the accident.
People are always telling me that I speak French very well.
